<div class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="header-author">
<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCDdwoeIU-0UfvBB0wgzYOKA" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              강승민.운동일지
            </span>
</a>
</h3>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="author-comment-badge"></span>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsor-comment-badge"></span>
<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=Ugx9TpqEl7luApDADdF4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsors-only-badge"></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="comment-content">
<ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="inline-thumbnail-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer">
<div class="thumbnail-container style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer">
<yt-img-shadow class="style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer" disable-upgrade="" object-fit="COVER">
</yt-img-shadow>
</div>
</a></ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer>
<ytd-expander class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" collapsed="" id="expander" max-number-of-lines="4" should-use-number-of-lines="" style="--ytd-expander-max-lines:4;"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope ytd-expander" id="content">
<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">
</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input=""><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">안녕하세요, 강승민입니다. 처음에는 최고의 엘리트 선수인 윤성빈 선수에게 제가 알려드릴 수 있는 것이 없을 거라고 생각해서, 엄청 긴장을 하고 있다가, 스튜디오 분위기도 너무 좋고, 윤성빈 선수님도 너무 기분 좋게 맞아주셔서 재미있게 촬영했던 것 같습니다.</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto"> </span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">처음에 중량을 오랜만에 다루신다고 했을 때 그래도 혹시 싶어서 스쿼트 초반 시도하실 때까지는 아주 조금 옆에서 긴장을 했는데, 그 이후로는 감상하면서 뭔가 썰풀이 하다가 온 것 같아요. 사실, 이미 한 분야의 정점에 도달하신만큼 운동 방식과 방향도 완성되어 있다고 생각했고, 자세도 다른 방식도 제가 배워간 것이 많은 것 같습니다.</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto"> </span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">가장 진심이 담겼던 감상은 마지막에 했던 ‘존나 멋있다’ 정도 일 것 같습니다. 뭔가 카메라로 담기 어려운 한마리 맹수 같은 에너지가 느껴집니다.</span></yt-formatted-string>
</div>
<tp-yt-paper-button animated="" aria-disabled="false" aria-expanded="true" class="style-scope ytd-expander" elevation="0" hidden="" id="less" noink="" role="button" style-target="host" tabindex="0"><!--css-build:shady-->
<span class="less-button style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" slot="less-button">간략히</span>
</tp-yt-paper-button>

<span class="more-button style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" slot="more-button">자세히 보기</span>
</tp-yt-paper-button>
</ytd-expander>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCxwH4bZZepHu8TJYm-yuhQw" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              laconic
            </span>
</a>
</h3>

</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">윤성빈선수님. 선수시절에 했던 스트렝스 프로그램 방법좀 알려주십시오. 특히 스쿼트랑 파워클린 좀 알려주십시오.뭔가 선수시절에 했던 3대는 기능적인 훈련으로 가져가는 방법도 궁금해여~</yt-formatted-string>

<ytd-toggle-button-renderer button-renderer="true" class="style-scope ytd-comment-action-buttons-renderer" icon-size="16" id="dislike-button"><yt-button-shape><a aria-label="댓글 싫어요 표시" aria-pressed="false" class="yt-spec-button-shape-next yt-spec-button-shape-next--text yt-spec-button-shape-next--mono yt-spec-button-shape-next--size-s yt-spec-button-shape-next--icon-button yt-spec-button-shape-next--override-small-size-icon" force-new-state="true" href="https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin?service=youtube&amp;uilel=3&amp;passive=true&amp;continue=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fsignin%3Faction_handle_signin%3Dtrue%26app%3Ddesktop%26hl%3Dko%26next%3D%252Fwatch%253Fv%253DSrHzagpFO3k&amp;hl=ko" style="" target=""><div aria-hidden="true" class="yt-spec-button-shape-next__icon"><yt-icon style="width: 24px; height: 24px;"><svg class="style-scope yt-icon" focusable="false" preserveaspectratio="xMidYMid meet" style="pointer-events: none; display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%;" viewbox="0 0 24 24"><g class="style-scope yt-icon"><path class="style-scope yt-icon" d="M17,4h-1H6.57C5.5,4,4.59,4.67,4.38,5.61l-1.34,6C2.77,12.85,3.82,14,5.23,14h4.23l-1.52,4.94C7.62,19.97,8.46,21,9.62,21 c0.58,0,1.14-0.24,1.52-0.65L17,14h4V4H17z M10.4,19.67C10.21,19.88,9.92,20,9.62,20c-0.26,0-0.5-0.11-0.63-0.3 c-0.07-0.1-0.15-0.26-0.09-0.47l1.52-4.94l0.4-1.29H9.46H5.23c-0.41,0-0.8-0.17-1.03-0.46c-0.12-0.15-0.25-0.4-0.18-0.72l1.34-6 C5.46,5.35,5.97,5,6.57,5H16v8.61L10.4,19.67z M20,13h-3V5h3V13z"></path></g></svg><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon></div><yt-touch-feedback-shape style="border-radius: inherit;"><div aria-hidden="true" class="yt-spec-touch-feedback-shape yt-spec-touch-feedback-shape--touch-response"><div class="yt-spec-touch-feedback-shape__stroke" style=""></div><div class="yt-spec-touch-feedback-shape__fill" style=""></div></div></yt-touch-feedback-shape></a></yt-button-shape>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCEQEBTdylH-m2TEWuPWtbrw" id="author-text">

            </span>

<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsor-comment-badge"></span>
<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgytN1ikHzgPlEbxSBR4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2주 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UC5xF18gbJOKf5MTPhLRmkmA" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCvT6qhYRj9W0JRO-BnC4UjA" id="author-text">

            </span>

<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsor-comment-badge"></span>
<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=Ugz2bb97q7ixmguoKkJ4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">1일 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCQRZivK1Bmj5_GgXv4NgOGw" id="author-text">

</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">윤성빈 선수 확실히 옛날에 비해 몸이 안좋아지긴 했네요. 속상한 마음은 알지만 지금 몸도 충분히 탑클래스라는거~</yt-formatted-string>

</a></ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer>

</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">리프팅벨트없이 썸리스로 대충 500찍어버리네ㄷㄷ 역시 국대클라스는 다르구나</yt-formatted-string>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UChIBZoi_GlfMpCkx201i1nA" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              Young
            </span>
</a>
</h3>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCrZvD25zVPi7fmz87pjPSRA" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              박스뎅
            </span>
</a>
</h3>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="author-comment-badge"></span>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsor-comment-badge"></span>
<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgxqTJA-HNkUA0GXeTV4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsors-only-badge"></span>
</div>
</div>

<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">

</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">사실 3대 운동 중 2개는 하체가 먹고 가는데 윤성빈 선수의 하체 보면 불가능 할 수가 없지..</yt-formatted-string>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UC-DqJl28R-KrW9VLMQxlFgA" id="author-text">

<ytd-expander class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" collapsed="" id="expander" max-number-of-lines="4" should-use-number-of-lines="" style="--ytd-expander-max-lines:4;"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope ytd-expander" id="content">
<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">
</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 개멋짐</yt-formatted-string>
</div>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCe2xG2akUto01fyn8GGT7fA" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgxsNgHdpgScaytYGZN4AaABAg.9i7_NXN_5TX9i7c8MvraZF" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="inline-thumbnail-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer">

<ytd-expander class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" collapsed="" id="expander" max-number-of-lines="4" should-use-number-of-lines="" style="--ytd-expander-max-lines:4;"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope ytd-expander" id="content">

<div class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="header-author">
<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UC4vgbHarsO8wQb9pVyPGKTA" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              햄햄
            </span>
</a>
</h3>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UChYh8ahGz_x8E2Er1bscZZQ" id="author-text">

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCwyoeBoOTTyuTms72o5f4OA" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgyiZS2bKZZN-wAn2jZ4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">3일 전(수정됨)</a></yt-formatted-string>

<ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="inline-thumbnail-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer">

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UC5P4ubbVacvynWjvuR85IOw" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgzR723M74QcAkJQdFl4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전(수정됨)</a></yt-formatted-string>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCRlyJR1vrwYayg-IyyT30-Q" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgxlWJCn0s7fGqy0O8Z4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCE8ETt6amfOHKH9jC_-FKOA" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgzkuxAP6PoQLAfk8It4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

</a></ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCL2-bwkWTZUn_j5pJQUTbXQ" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=Ugzd-c5zYdwM4MUr1SB4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCgSe0WrVOAqwhfs-TyebTdw" id="author-text">

<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsor-comment-badge"></span>
<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=Ugyy8d3u9YmW572iQ194AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

</div>
<div class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="comment-content">
<ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="inline-thumbnail-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer">
<div class="thumbnail-container style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer">
<yt-img-shadow class="style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer" disable-upgrade="" object-fit="COVER">
</yt-img-shadow>
</div>
</a></ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer>
<ytd-expander class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" collapsed="" id="expander" max-number-of-lines="4" should-use-number-of-lines="" style="--ytd-expander-max-lines:4;"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope ytd-expander" id="content">
<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">
</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">태릉인괴 일반인 정말 틀리죠. 올림픽 매달리스트에 땀울 진지하게 보신분들이 뱔로 없죠. 윤성빈 선수 맛지네요.</yt-formatted-string>
</div>

<ytd-expander class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" collapsed="" id="expander" max-number-of-lines="4" should-use-number-of-lines="" style="--ytd-expander-max-lines:4;"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope ytd-expander" id="content">
<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">
</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">아이언빈 채널이라 헐크가 게스트로도 나오는군요</yt-formatted-string>
</div>
<tp-yt-paper-button animated="" aria-disabled="false" aria-expanded="true" class="style-scope ytd-expander" elevation="0" hidden="" id="less" noink="" role="button" style-target="host" tabindex="0"><!--css-build:shady-->
<span class="less-button style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" slot="less-button">간략히</span>
</tp-yt-paper-button>

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgyiF7xjEiX4K3Ao2aJ4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전(수정됨)</a></yt-formatted-string>

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgzbBbsKZKs8yBO-nZ94AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCyrXHY93koXb54UMvFSmIww" id="author-text">

            </span>
</a>
</h3>

<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">
</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input=""><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">아니 윤성빈선수보다 어깨가 훨 넓다고요?</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">ㄱㅋㅋ ㄱ진짜 대학원생 맞습니까ㅜㅜ</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">나의 대학원생은 연약하고 나약한 이미지인데ㅋㄱㅋ</span></yt-formatted-string>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCowxRLNPXb5ruOsHrLBZBWA" id="author-text">

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCY2m3jGLlYNgx1hMk1GRZUA" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgzjzT5U0GcXRnyraTh4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<div class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="header-author">
<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCvYjJsPXgehGeWMPwjsWR1A" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              승상Vlog
            </span>
</a>
</h3>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCzuzYX_l9rmkWLJB1YBXVVA" id="author-text">

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=Ugwq7A8alYnAexZZFlN4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgwUWsrVIjU0zRktBQh4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">ㅋㅋㅋㅋ ㄹㅇ 1rm하면 600칠거 같은데?</yt-formatted-string>

<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgzJEf_LReCTc3FqSq14AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>

<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">
</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input="">매번 언급하는 선수기량, 자꾸만 나오는 몸이 죽어가고 있다.. 이런 밑밥까는 놈들 특징 : 돌추럴.. 올림픽 메달 따고 다음 올림픽 때 걸릴까봐 그때쯤 약 끊었겠지ㅋㅋ</yt-formatted-string>

<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCjg_OLKrW4QvV-BHjsW3dmw" id="author-text">

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCGKmSmP0t3wtLboRK1dPEFw" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              까버령
            </span>
</a>
</h3>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="author-comment-badge"></span>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsor-comment-badge"></span>
<yt-formatted-string class="published-time-text style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" has-link-only_="" link-inherit-color=""><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto" href="/watch?v=SrHzagpFO3k&amp;lc=UgzbcPxA6mSE_tQ7hHh4AaABAg" spellcheck="false">2개월 전</a></yt-formatted-string>
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="sponsors-only-badge"></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="comment-content">
<ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="inline-thumbnail-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--><a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer">

</a></ytd-comment-inline-thumbnail-renderer>
<ytd-expander class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" collapsed="" id="expander" max-number-of-lines="4" should-use-number-of-lines="" style="--ytd-expander-max-lines:4;"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope ytd-expander" id="content">
<yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" hidden="" id="paid-comment-chip" slot="content"><!--css-build:shady--><div class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-container"><yt-icon class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer"><!--css-build:shady--></yt-icon><span class="style-scope yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer" id="comment-chip-price">
</span></div></yt-pdg-comment-chip-renderer><yt-formatted-string class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" id="content-text" slot="content" split-lines="" user-input=""><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">솔직히 별 영양가 없는 채널 </span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">윤성빈이라는 매리트 제외하고 </span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">파워리프팅을 배워서 적용한다던지</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">
</span><span class="style-scope yt-formatted-string" dir="auto">하는 그런거 전혀없고 그냥 브이로그 수준</span></yt-formatted-string>
</div>

<h3 class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
<a class="yt-simple-endpoint style-scope ytd-comment-renderer" href="/channel/UCzTi6z5aEdtKFJsfGIGRa8w" id="author-text">
<span class="style-scope ytd-comment-renderer">
              진슈 이
            </span>
</a>
